title: Which AI Roleplay Character Matches You?
description: Take this fun personality quiz to discover which AI roleplay character is your perfect match. Answer 8 quick questions and find your ideal AI chat companion!

dark.title: The Dark Romantic
dark.description: You're drawn to intensity, mystery, and the thrill of the forbidden. You love characters with depth, secrets, and a dangerous edge.
dark.tip: Try starting with a Vampire Teacher or Demon Lord â€” their dark charisma will keep you hooked.

romantic.title: The Hopeless Romantic
romantic.description: You believe in deep connections, tender moments, and love that conquers all. You want characters who make your heart flutter.
romantic.tip: Start with Childhood Friend or CafÃ© Owner â€” their warmth and sweetness will melt your heart.

adventurous.title: The Thrill Seeker
adventurous.description: You crave excitement, exploration, and epic adventures. You want characters who take you on wild rides to unknown worlds.
adventurous.tip: Jump in with Pirate Captain or Space Commander â€” adventure awaits!

intellectual.title: The Deep Thinker
intellectual.description: You value intelligence, wit, and meaningful conversations. You want characters who challenge your mind and keep you thinking.
intellectual.tip: Try Yandere Librarian or Detective Partner â€” they'll match your intellectual energy.

charismatic.title: The Social Butterfly
charismatic.description: You're drawn to charm, confidence, and magnetic personalities. You want characters who light up every scene they're in.
charismatic.tip: Start with Idol Star or Mafia Boss â€” their charisma is irresistible.

wholesome.title: The Gentle Soul
wholesome.description: You appreciate kindness, warmth, and genuine connections. You want characters who feel like coming home.
wholesome.tip: Try Chef Mentor or Tea Master â€” their calming presence is exactly what you need.

passionate.title: The Intense Lover
passionate.description: You want fire, chemistry, and emotional depth. You're drawn to characters with strong feelings and dramatic storylines.
passionate.tip: Dive in with Yandere Classmate or Tsundere Nurse â€” the emotional rollercoaster is worth it.

heroic.title: The Noble Hero
heroic.description: You admire courage, honor, and selflessness. You want characters who stand for something and inspire you to be better.
heroic.tip: Start with Knight Captain or Dragon Guardian â€” their noble spirit will inspire you.

mysterious.title: The Enigma Seeker
mysterious.description: You love unraveling secrets, hidden layers, and the unknown. You want characters who keep you guessing and always have more to reveal.
mysterious.tip: Try Fortune Teller or Ghost Roommate â€” there's always another layer to discover.
